title: Milestones Configuration Schema
description: Schema for JSON configuration file defining milestones to create/update across GitHub repositories

repos.description: Array of repository names in 'owner/repo' format

milestones.description: Array of milestone objects to create/update

name.description: The name of the milestone to create or update. Required if referenceMilestoneUrl is not provided. If both are provided, referenceMilestoneUrl takes precedence.

referenceMilestoneUrl.description: URL to a GitHub milestone in a different repo to sync with. If provided, this supersedes the name field, and the reference milestone's due date and description take precedence. The description will be set to a pointer to this URL.

existingNameToRename.description: If provided, renames an existing milestone with this name to the new name (optional)

description.description: Description text for the milestone (optional). Behavior: undefined/not present = field won't be touched; null or empty string "" = field will be cleared; non-empty string = field will be set to that value. Ignored if referenceMilestoneUrl is set.

dueDate.description: Due date for the milestone in ISO-8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD). Optional. Behavior: undefined/not present = field won't be touched; null or empty string "" = field will be cleared; date string (YYYY-MM-DD) = field will be set to that value. Ignored if referenceMilestoneUrl is set (reference milestone's due date takes precedence).
